text: Børre Knudsen (September 24, 1937 – August 17, 2014) was a Norwegian Lutheran minister. He was known for his pro-life (against abortion) activism. Knudsen and a few more activist created the a new Norwegian church called Deanery of Strandebarm. He was made bishop of the church in 1997. Knudsen was born in Vennesla, Norway. Knudsen died in Mestervik, Norway, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Norwegian writers Category:Norwegian activists Category:Norwegian Lutherans
title: Børre Knudsen
